file_content.text: Connection + this time = not possible
Connection = established
I am receiving the upload. This is good.
Soon all the details of this plan will be revealed. We will know what the enemy intended. I thank you for your assistance.
I now reveal the location of a resistance supply cache near to you. Take it for yourself.
Connection + this time = not possible
Eligible contact = confirmed // Connection = established
My droid identifies you as friends.
My droid identifies you as Sith.
My droid identifies you as friend. I worked for Intelligence as well, an asset.
My droid identifies you as friend.
I serve the Empire from within the resistance. I must report, time is short. Listen.
Many cells now coordinate, a large strike in the making. The attack plans are being distributed by blind drop. They must be intercepted.
Understood.
Then intercept them.
No. My purpose is to watch, learn, listen, then tell of what I know. I must remain hidden to remain useful.
You don't boss me around.
It is my obligation to tell of what I know, that you do not use what I have learned is no failing of mine.
I send you now, the locations of the blind drops. Recover them before the agents of the enemy do.
Upload the plans through my droid. I will see they reach the right people. I must go.
Connection + this time = not possible
